Package com.jbq2.simplebankapi.endpoints.authenticated_accessible.user.update_profile_page

Class UpdateProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.jbq2.simplebankapi.endpoints.authenticated_accessible.user.update_profile_page.UpdateProfileController
@RequestMapping("/api/v1/user") @RestController public class UpdateProfileController extends Object
Controller class that handles requests to update user profiles.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Joshua Quizon

  • Method Details

    • getPageContent

      @GetMapping("/content") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getPageContent(@RequestHeader String jwt) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Login-protected GET endpoint that provides the web application with the page content personalized to the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      jwt - The JSON web token of the user obtained from the "jwt" header of the request.
      Returns:
      Returns a ResponseEntity containing the email address of the user.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - Throws a JsonProcessingException if the writeValueAsString() method throws a JsonProcessingException.

    • updateProfile

      @PostMapping("/update") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateProfile(@RequestBody UpdateProfileForm updateProfileForm)
      Login-protected POST endpoint that accepts the update profile form contents.
      Parameters:
      updateProfileForm - Contains the information the user entered as well as the user's old information.
      Returns:
      Returns a ResponseEntity object containing an UpdateProfileResponse object and a status code which can differ between a 200 OK, 401 UNAUTHORIZED, or 417 EXPECTATION FAILED
